plot: Sipho, a 12 year-old boy, and his sister Joyce, 15; the only remaining members of their small family farm. AIDS claimed their parents and older brother. The disease may yet separate the children. A sad story but with hope.
title: Sipho and Joyce
plot_es: Sipho, a 12 year-old boy, and his sister Joyce, 15; the only remaining members of their small family farm. AIDS claimed their parents and older brother. The disease may yet separate the children. A sad story but with hope.
